name: Astro Boy
description:
Astro Boy is an arcade game developed by Sonic Team. It was originally released in 2004. It was published by SEGA. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Astro Boy is available on PlayStation 2.
Mineko Okamura produced the game. Hideki Anbo directed the game. It was scored by Fumie Kumatani, Hideaki Kobayashi, Mariko Nanba and Naofumi Hataya.
